name: Starwood Property Trust, Inc.
description: Starwood Property Trust, Inc. is one of the largest commercial mortgage real estate investment trusts (REITs) in the United States. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut, the company focuses on acquiring, financing, and managing a diverse portfolio of real estate-related investments. Starwood Property Trust primarily invests in loans secured by commercial real estate, including multifamily, office, hotel, and retail properties. The company aims to deliver attractive risk-adjusted returns to its shareholders through a combination of interest income and capital appreciation. With a strong emphasis on strategic partnerships and a seasoned management team, Starwood Property Trust leverages its extensive industry relationships and market knowledge to identify compelling investment opportunities. The company is committed to maintaining a disciplined investment strategy and adhering to high standards of corporate governance. Starwood Property Trust also engages in the acquisition and ownership of real estate properties, positioning itself to capitalize on the growth potential in various segments of the real estate market. By focusing on both debt and equity investments, the company seeks to create a well-balanced portfolio that can withstand market fluctuations and deliver consistent performance over time.

seo.meta_title: Starwood Property Trust, Inc. | Commercial Real Estate Investments
seo.meta_description: Explore Starwood Property Trust, Inc., a leading commercial mortgage REIT, focusing on real estate-related investments in the U.S. market.

faq.question: What does Starwood Property Trust do?
faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust invests in commercial mortgages and real estate, focusing on various property types.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Starwood Property Trust?
faq.answer: Barry Sternlicht is the CEO of Starwood Property Trust, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Starwood Property Trust headquartered?
faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust is headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut, USA.

faq.question: What are the main investment focuses of Starwood Property Trust?
faq.answer: The main focuses are commercial mortgages and equity investments in various real estate sectors.

faq.question: When was Starwood Property Trust founded?
faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust was founded in 2009.
